LanguageData.OTC_Helmet.label: OTC Mechanic Helmet
LanguageData.OTC_Helmet.description: Light power armor Helmet, well protects the owner. Designed for use by OTC Mechanics.
LanguageData.OTC_Helmet_M.label: OTC Engineer Helmet
LanguageData.OTC_Helmet_M.description: Light power armor Helmet, well protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by OTC Engineers.\n\nThe hardened version provides more protection to the owner.
LanguageData.OTC_Helmet_M_Spacer.label: OTC Engineer Helmet(Space Griffin)
LanguageData.OTC_Helmet_M_Spacer.description: Light power armor Helmet, well protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by OTC Engineers.\n\nPressure-sealed version designed to keep the occupant alive in outer space.
LanguageData.OTC_Helmet_M_Melee.label: OTC Engineer Helmet(Gladiator)
LanguageData.OTC_Helmet_M_Melee.description: Light power armor Helmet, well protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by OTC Engineers.\n\nModified visor with analyzing computer that helps the user close combat.
LanguageData.OTC_Helmet_M_Ranged.label: OTC Engineer Helmet(Ranger)
LanguageData.OTC_Helmet_M_Ranged.description: Light power armor Helmet, well protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by OTC Engineers.\n\nModified visor with targeting computer that helps the user aim.
LanguageData.OTC_Helmet_M_Mechanitor.label: OTC Engineer Helmet(Overseer)
LanguageData.OTC_Helmet_M_Mechanitor.description: Light power armor Helmet, well protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by OTC Engineers.\n\nModified for improves Mechanoids Control abilities.
LanguageData.OTC_Armor.label: OTC Mechanic Armor
LanguageData.OTC_Armor.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner with little mobility restriction. Designed for use by OTC Mechanics.
LanguageData.OTC_Armor_M.label: OTC Engineer Armor
LanguageData.OTC_Armor_M.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner with little mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by OTC Engineers.\n\nThe hardened version provides more protection to the owner.
LanguageData.OTC_Armor_M_Spacer.label: OTC Engineer Armor(Space Griffin)
LanguageData.OTC_Armor_M_Spacer.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner with little mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by OTC Engineers.\n\nPressure-sealed version designed to keep the occupant alive in outer space.
LanguageData.OTC_Armor_M_Grenadier_Acid.label: OTC Engineer Armor(Acid Viper)
LanguageData.OTC_Armor_M_Grenadier_Acid.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner with little mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by OTC Engineers.\n\nModified by installing a Acid Grenade Launcher.
LanguageData.OTC_Armor_M_Grenadier_Cryo.label: OTC Engineer Armor(Cryo Viper)
LanguageData.OTC_Armor_M_Grenadier_Cryo.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner with little mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by OTC Engineers.\n\nModified by installing a Cryo Grenade Launcher.
LanguageData.OTC_Armor_M_Grenadier_Fire.label: OTC Engineer Armor(Fire Viper)
LanguageData.OTC_Armor_M_Grenadier_Fire.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner with little mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by OTC Engineers.\n\nModified by installing a Fire Grenade Launcher.
LanguageData.OTC_Armor_M_Grenadier_EMP.label: OTC Engineer Armor(EMP Viper)
LanguageData.OTC_Armor_M_Grenadier_EMP.description:
Light power armor, well protects the owner with little mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by OTC Engineers.

Modified by installing a EMP Grenade Launcher.

Warning! EMP damage isn't intended to destroy meatbags.
LanguageData.OTC_Armor_M_Shield.label: OTC Engineer Armor(Guardian)
LanguageData.OTC_Armor_M_Shield.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner with little mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by OTC Engineers.\n\nModified with the addition of a Reinforced Barrier.
LanguageData.OTC_Armor_M_Barrier.label: OTC Engineer Armor(Protector)
LanguageData.OTC_Armor_M_Barrier.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner with little mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by OTC Engineers.\n\nModified with the addition of the Universal Barrier.
LanguageData.OTC_Armor_M_Mechanitor.label: OTC Engineer Armor(Overseer)
LanguageData.OTC_Armor_M_Mechanitor.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner with little mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by OTC Engineers.\n\nModified with the addition of a Mechanoids Control pack.
LanguageData.OTC_Armor_M_Turret.label: OTC Engineer Armor(Goblin)
LanguageData.OTC_Armor_M_Turret.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner with little mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by OTC Engineers.\n\nModified with the pack that allows the user to deploy a battery-powered turret.
LanguageData.Grenade_Armor_OTC_Acid.label: Acid Viper Grenade
LanguageData.Grenade_Armor_OTC_Cryo.label: Cryo Viper Grenade
LanguageData.Grenade_Armor_OTC_Fire.label: Fire Viper Grenade
LanguageData.Grenade_Armor_OTC_EMP.label: EMP Viper Grenade
LanguageData.Grenade_Armor_OTC_TurretPack_Acid.label: OTC turret pack capsule
LanguageData.Grenade_Armor_OTC_TurretPack_Cryo.label: OTC turret pack capsule
LanguageData.Grenade_Armor_OTC_TurretPack_Fire.label: OTC turret pack capsule
LanguageData.Grenade_Armor_OTC_TurretPack_EMP.label: OTC turret pack capsule
